snippet: Can American football take root in India and other Asian countries?
abstract: Can American football take root in India and other Asian countries?
lead_paragraph: MUMBAI, Maharashtra — “On a recent Saturday morning, nearly 20 players from the Mumbai Gladiators football team went through their weekly drills and scrimmage at the popular Juhu Beach,” Vikas Bajaj and Ken Belson wrote in The New York Times. “Elderly people and families out for walks appeared confused as they passed by. One couple approached the men to ask what game they were playing,” Mr. Bajaj and Mr. Belson wrote.

headline.main: Professional Football Makes a Play for India
